decks.notes: Utilize artifacts and powerful synergies to overwhelm opponents quickly with a mix of creature and spell-based threats in an aggressive manner. The deck focuses on maximizing the potential of artifacts with cards like Ensoul Artifact and Sheltered by Ghosts, while also disrupting opponents with cards such as Portable Hole and Metallic Rebuke. By combining efficient creatures like Thraben Inspector and Regal Bunnicorn with artifact support, the deck aims to apply pressure from the early game onwards and maintain tempo advantage throughout the match.
